name: Caldron Magen
languages: understands Common plus two other languages but can't speak

trait.name: Disintegration
entries: If the magen dies, it disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The magen has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The magen makes two attacks, using Extended Fist or Acid Spittle in any combination.

action.name: Extended Fist
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 15 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) Bludgeoning damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Acid damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 14}) from one of two fists.
